CHAT.comment: CHAT format needs to be double-checked
screen time is elapsed time from beginning of visit in min:sec
much of C's speech is garbled although loud; M sometimes doesn't understand either

u.a: screen time
C sets plate down; reaches into play+house

C picks up pitcher
C picks up a knife

C stops stirring; takes spoon out; hands to M
